name: windows-domain
title: Windows Domain
description: Get Information from your current Windows Domain

commands.name: my-user
commands.title: My User
commands.description: Get Information about the current Windows Domain User including password expire date

commands.name: search-user
commands.title: Search User
commands.description: Search for a User in the logged in Windows Domain

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: tonka3000
